org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class ParityAcc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Acc<StateRun>
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AbstractNGBWLikeAcc
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.ParityAcc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, SetListener<State>, Editable

    public class ParityAcc
extends AbstractNGBWLikeAcc
    A parity acceptance condition is a list {F0, F1, F2, ..., Fn} where Fi's are state sets. Note that a valid parity acceptance condition should contain all states of an automaton and every state can only be in one Fi. If a state is in Fi, then the index i is the parity of the state.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public ParityAcc clone(java.util.Map<State,State> smap,
                       java.util.Map<Transition,Transition> tmap)
        Description copied from class: Acc
        Makes a clone of this acceptance condition. The content of the clone will be changed according to the given maps.
        Overrides:
        clone in class AbstractNGBWLikeAcc
        Parameters:
        smap - a map from states of the automaton with this acceptance condition to states of another automaton with the clone of this acceptance condition

        Returns:
        the clone of this acceptance condition

      • propagate

        public void propagate()
        Propagates parities of states in this parity condition. This method does nothing if this parity condition is not added to any automaton.
